nodes.label: if amt >= 10_000 { * * ctx . accounts . dep_acc . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += amt * 2 ; } else { let fee = amt / 100 ; * * ctx . accounts . dep_acc . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += amt - fee ; }
* * ctx . accounts . dep_acc . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += amt - fee ;
msg ! ("預金責任者 {} が deposit 実行" , ctx . accounts . custodian . key ()) ;
